Commands.Starshell: Raises all party members' BRV based on Attack  Casts 「Target Lock」 on all enemies for 1 turn  Grants 「Very Large Evasion Rate Up」 for 1 turn
Commands.Piercer: 1-HIT ranged BRV+HP attack  Inflicts 「Small Defense Down」 to target for 2 turns  Grants 「Mood Maker」 for 4 turns    While 「Mood Maker」 is active:  - Turns 「BRV Attack」 to 「BRV Attack+」  - Turns 「HP Attack」 to 「HP Attack+」   「Mood Maker」 raises Max BRV and Attack
Commands.BRV Attack+: 1-HIT ranged BRV attack   When a Break Mark is displayed on an enemy, turns 「BRV Attack+」 to 「Overkill」  「Overkill」 has the following effects:  - 2-HIT ranged BRV attack  - Inflicts 「Small Attack Down」 to target for 1 turn   A Break Mark is displayed if the target was priorly broken by an ally
Commands.HP Attack+: 1-HIT ranged BRV+HP attack   When a Break Mark is displayed on an enemy, turns 「HP Attack+」 to 「Crackshot」  「Crackshot」 has the following effects:  - 2-HIT ranged BRV+HP attack  - Ignores Defense   A Break Mark is displayed if the target was priorly broken by an ally
Commands.Attack Speed: Slightly raises Attack and Marginally raises Speed for 2 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Trigger Happy: Deals successive 1-HIT ranged BRV+HP attacks 10 times  The first attack hits the main target while the remaining 9 are dispersed based on the number of enemies  Grants 「King's Buddy」 for 6 turns   「King's Buddy」 has the following effects:  - Raises party Max BRV and Attack  - Raises self Speed

Passives.Starshell Light: Slightly lowers the Action Delay of  Starshell
Passives.Chase Bonus: Slightly raises BRV damage during a Chase Sequence
Passives.Piercer Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Piercer
Passives.Buff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while buffed
Passives.Overkill&Crackshot Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Overkill  and  Crackshot
Passives.Emotion-Charged Photos: Slightly raises Attack and Speed while  Mood Maker  is active
Passives.Buff Boost&Speed Up: Slightly raises Max BRV and Speed while buffed
Passives.Starshell Extend: When using  Starshell :- Tremendously raises the BRV gain based on Attack- Grants  Small Physical Attack Up  to all party members for 10 turns
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost All: Slightly raises party's Max BRV and Attack while buffed
Passives.Piercer Extend: When using  Piercer :- Increases number of hits to 3- Tremendously raises total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV- Slightly improves the effects of  Mood Maker When using  BRV Attack+ ,  Overkill :- Moderately raises BRV potencyWhen using  Overkill :- Lowers Action DelayWhen using  HP Attack+ ,  Crackshot :- Moderately raises BRV potency
Passives.Radiance of Destruction and Power: Raises Max BRV and Attack by 20%
Passives.Attack Speed Extend: When using  Attack Speed , adds the following effects:- Marginally improves  Attack Up  and  Speed Up  effects

Weapons.Cocytus CP: 15: When using  Starshell :- Raises the BRV gain based on Attack- Extends the duration of  Evasion Rate Up
Weapons.Quicksilver CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Trigger Happy
Weapons.Mythril Pistol CP: 35: When using  Piercer :- Raises BRV potency- Improves  Defense Down  and extends its duration- Improves  Mood Maker  and extends its durationWhen using  Overkill :- Raises BRV potency- Improves  Attack Down When using  Crackshot :- Raises BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Attack Speed  use +1Duration of  Attack Speed  effects +2 turns
